name: cpcbasicts
description: # CPCBasicTS - Run CPC BASIC in a Browser

scripts.build: tsc && cp src/*.html src/*.css dist/ && mkdirp -p dist/ts && cp -r src/*.ts dist/ts/ && mkdirp -p dist/test/ts/test && cp -r src/test/*.ts dist/test/ts/test && cp src/test/*.html dist/test/
scripts.build-testXX: tsc && mkdirp -p dist/ts/test && cp -r src/test/*.ts dist/ts/test

keywords: CPC BASIC, Locomotive BASIC, Amstrad CPC, Schneider CPC, BASIC Compiler
author: Marco Vieth
